cause.description:
stopping child abuse can save a childs life and help him or ehr to become successul in life,don't let a child get abused or sexually assulted becasue it will scar them for life and they might not recover
1. children need a safe environment
2. children need to be protected at all cost
3. parents and peers need to love children no matter wat
cause.mission: stop the abuse by parents and peers towards children
cause.name: STOP CHILD ABUSE
